package.name: rose_joystick
package.description:
The rose_joystick_teleop package subscribes to the state of a joystick. The joy package has a node 'joy_node' that publishes a Joy-message with the state of the connected joystick.
The node in this package converts that state to a control signal for the base (/cmd_vel), head, neck, arms etc.
The current mode is published at ~mode. The mode can be set via a service at ~set_mode. Which modes are available via that service is published at ~available_modes
